example.name: transitive
example.text: Once inside , she spends nearly four hours [*-2] measuring and diagramming each room in the 80-year-old house , [*-2] gathering enough information [*] to estimate what it [*EXP*-3] would cost [*T*-1] [*] to rebuild it .
